Description: Wooden head-rest; incised Hieroglyphic text and representation of protective deities.
Curator's comments: Published: F. Ballod, Prolegomena zur Geschichte der zwerghaften Goetter in Aegypten, Moscow 1913, pp. 24-26, fig. 1 (p. 25) W. Seipel, Aegypten, Goetter und die Kunst, I, Linz 1989, pp. 243 f. [406] M. Perraud, BIFAO 102 (2002), pp. 309-326
